mapper.select: SELECT reverseauction_no, reverseauction_register_date, reverseauction_update_date, reverseauction_title, reverseauction_content, reverseauction_tender_count, auction_state_category_name FROM reverseauction_register WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reverseauction_register( reverseauction_no, member_id, reverseauction_register_date, reverseauction_update_date, reverseauction_tender_limit, reverseauction_tenderclose_date, reverseauction_rooming_date, reverseauction_leaving_date, reverseauction_title, reverseauction_address, reverseauction_address_more, reverseauction_hits, reverseauction_content, reverseauction_tender_count, auction_state_category_no, auction_state_category_name, reverseauction_number_of_people) VALUES (0, #{memberId}, now(), null, #{reverseauctionTenderLimit}, #{reverseauctionTendercloseDate}, #{reverseauctionRoomingDate}, #{reverseauctionLeavingDate}, #{reverseauctionTitle}, #{reverseauctionAddress}, #{reverseauctionAddressMore}, 0, #{reverseauctionContent}, 0, 1, "낙찰대기중", #{reverseauctionNumberOfPeople})
mapper.update: UPDATE reverseauction_register SET reverseauction_update_date=now(), reverseauction_tender_limit=#{reverseauctionTenderLimit}, reverseauction_tenderclose_date=#{reverseauctionTendercloseDate}, reverseauction_leaving_date=#{reverseauctionLeavingDate}, reverseauction_title=#{reverseauctionTitle}, reverseauction_address=#{reverseauctionAddress}, reverseauction_address_more=#{reverseauctionAddressMore}, reverseauction_content=#{reverseauctionContent} WHERE reverseauction_no=#{reverseauctionNo}
UPDATE reverseauction_register SET reverseauction_hits = reverseauction_hits + 1 WHERE reverseauction_no=#{reverseauctionNo}
